title: Slice of Hell Cake
info: Slice of Hell Cake is an equipable pet that can be found in Shadow Chests, Hellstone Crates, and Obsidian Crates. It summons a Baby Imp that follows the player around.
stat:
Type
Pet summon
Use time20 (Very fast)
TooltipSummons a baby imp
'He hasn't learned how to teleport yet!'
